snippet: The museum’s fund-raising has slipped, its days of operation have been slashed from six to four, and roughly a fifth of its staff was laid off this year.
abstract: The museum’s fund-raising has slipped, its days of operation have been slashed from six to four, and roughly a fifth of its staff was laid off this year.

headline.main: El Museo del Barrio's Board President to Leave
headline.print_headline: Board President to Leave El Museo del Barrio
